title: Women working in the media
creator_credit: Don Fitzsimmons, Julie Sheehan, Sabina Baltrukomis and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Pat Walter, a video camera operator, Julie Copeland, a radio broadcaster and producer, and Lina Caneva, a TV and radio journalist, discuss their experiences as women working in the male-dominated TV and radio industry.
creator_credit_for_label: Don Fitzsimmons, Julie Sheehan, Sabina Baltrukomis and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
description: Pat Walter, a video camera operator, Julie Copeland, a radio broadcaster and producer, and Lina Caneva, a TV and radio journalist, discuss their experiences as women working in the male-dominated TV and radio industry.
